H0.text: who is sir francis bacon. Scientist

H1.text: who is sir francis bacon. Statesman

H2.text: who is sir francis bacon. Lawyer

H3.text: who is sir francis bacon. Philosopher

A4.text: Francis Bacon was an English philosopher

A5.text: Francis Bacon served as Attorney General and Lord Chancellor of England under King James I

A6.text: Bacon argued for the importance of natural philosophy, guided by the scientific method, and his works remained influential throughout the Scientific Revolution.

A7.text: He has been called the father of empiricism.
